Class com.polk.appointment.Activity 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.util.Date
           |
           +----com.polk.appointment.Time_Slot
                   |
                   +----com.polk.appointment.Activity
class Activity
extends Time_Slot
implements Serializable, Component_Interface
An activity is simply a time slot that has a description. This is suitable for things that an employee might do in his/her own with no requrements of other employees.

This class is not public and therefore cannot be used outside this package.
